attributes.additional_details: How many times have you visited a sick relative and have had to pay to visit them?  Paying to visit a relative is nothing short of a national scandal. We believe that the Government should act to abolish hospital car parking charges once and for all.
attributes.background: We believe that hospital car parking charges should be abolished.  It is wrong that when people visit relatives in hospital that they have to pay extortionate car parking charges.  Hospitals car parking charges should be abolished and should be free to all who use them.
